name: LD52 - Fruit Picker xTreme
description:
Really didn't have much luck in the time department this year, only really managed to get 6-7 hours of time I could spend fully on the game.  

But it's playable enough for me to consider it a (very minimally viable) game nonetheless. The core feature is in place, but everything else is just not there.

There's fruits to be picked though, albeit only pineapples, and only from a fixed set of plants.
